name: Cubed (ItsKale)
description:
That lives in a cubed world
And all day and all night
And everything he sees is just cubed
Like him inside and outside

Cube his house
With a Cube little window
And a Cube corvette
And everything is Cube for him
And himself and everybody around
Cause he ain't got nobody to listen to

I'm Cubed
Da ba dee da ba di

WELCOME TO CUBED.

This is just a nice funny little arcade game where you go through levelling up, collecting upgrades, and bashing the &@$# out of all the other worthless primitive shapes.

:D 

Current version is release for gamejam, and will stay here, however i will be adding functioning highscores, and an options menu and more enemy types, upgrades, and maps, over hte next few days.
